WorkItem.Description:
Can you please fix the following:
 
1. Talent check: Master poisoner and auto-select it at the Buffs
2. Talent check: Murder and auto select target is valid for murder (since latest patch murder is always valid)
3. Glyphs from armory: It doesnt seem to auto select Glyph of Hunger for Blood
 
My character if you want to test:
EU-Moonglade
Ralthur
 
I only use the assa spec.

Comments.Message: Murder is fixed in the next release.

Master Poisoner should not be auto selected if you have the talent as selecting it will mean that someone else in your raid is keeping the 3% Crit debuff up, which can be useful if you for some reason use dual Instant Poison.
As I'm planning to in the future let the optimizer select the poisons (with an override of course) it might turn out for it to better to not keep Master Poisoner active if someone else in your raid already does it.
Parsing for Glyph of Hunger For Blood is fixed in the next release.
